name: teams_standings_short
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool livescore_sports.
Tool description: LiveScore Sports | The number one destination for real time scores for Football, Cricket, Tennis, Basketball, Hockey and more. Support: tipsters@rapi.one / t.me/api_tipsters You can make a website like: soccerway.com, aiscore.com, tipsscore.com, livescore.com 
API description: Fetch the team standings based on the given team ID.

locale.description: The locale code to localize the response.

team_id.description: The unique identifier for the team.
